SELECT CAST(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS signed integer) AS ROWNUM,review_writer,content,review_list.isbn,DATE_FORMAT(review_list.regdate, "%Y년 %m월 %d일") as 'review_list.regdate',review_email,num,star_point_list.star_point
FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R,review_list join star_point_list on(review_list.isbn=star_point_list.isbn and review_list.review_email=star_point_list.star_point_email )
WHERE review_list.isbn = #{isbn}
ORDER BY num desc
LIMIT 0,5
